articles.author: Melissa Alonso and Emma Tucker, CNN
articles.title: Kodak Black arrested for trespassing on New Year's Day - CNN
articles.description: Kodak Black was arrested Saturday in Pompano Beach, Florida, on a misdemeanor trespassing charge, according to Broward County Court records.

articles.title: Number of Female Directors on Top Hollywood Films Declines in 2021 - Variety
